law.catch_line: Annual withholding statement to be furnished employee.

text.section: The statement required to be furnished by this section in respect of any wages shall be furnished at such other times, shall contain such other information, and shall be in such form as the department may by regulations prescribe. A duplicate of such statement if made and filed in accordance with regulations prescribed by the department shall constitute the return required to be made in respect of such wages under KRS 141.150.
The department may promulgate regulations providing for reasonable extensions of time, not in excess of thirty (30) days, to employers required to furnish statements under this section.

law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 499, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 27, effective June 17, 1954.
